title: IP not functioning
body: When i play, it shows the ip working normally, but when i buy something, e.g me having 5000 ip and buying something for 4800 ip, it says that i have 4000 ip instead of 5000 ip which is causing me to be unable to buy anything in that amount or above.

replies.body:
Hi jdao,

Thanks for the report - we're currently looking into this issue, [and will keep everyone updated in the main discussion thread here. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug)
